name: Ctrl.Phobia
description:
Made for Cyberpunk Jam 2019
Are you afraid of being controlled? 
In Ctrl.Phobia you control a young hacker trying to escape this dystopian society where everything and everyone is constantly monitored.  Every move, every word, every breath is controlled. You can't stand this anymore. So you run.

Make your way to the top of the skyscraper in order to flee from the police. Remember you can't go back.

Ctrl.Phobia is fast paced 2D platformer with  shooting elements and these are the controls:

Z -> Jump
X-> Shoot
Arrows -> Movement
Up arrow -> Climb ladder
Down arrow + Z -> Descend platforms

Programmers:
Giorgio Ferraresi
Alessio Sicoli
Alessia Mazzocchi

Designers:
Tommaso Verde
Lorenzo Malara

2D artists:

Alessio Schibuola

Gianmarco Rinaldi
